EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.Istanbul Reminder Sept 10 Send
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Tuesday at SpringOne Tour!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you Tuesday at SpringOne Tour Istanbul <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/istanbul?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-istanbul-q318]]>. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at springonetour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springonetour@pivotal.io]]> with any questions. Please be sure to bring your government-issued ID, like a driver's license, with you when you check in.
Tuesday, September 11 - Day 1 Agenda

8:00 am

8:45 am

9:00 am
Reactive Spring with Spring Boot 2.0
9:55 am

5:30 pm
Social & Networking at Wyndham Grand Istanbul Levent <[[http://www.wyndhamgrandlevent.com/]]>
7:30 pm
Day Ends

Location Wyndham Grand Istanbul Levent <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Wyndham+Grand+Istanbul+Levent/@41.0774201,29.0135852,15z/data=!4m7!3m6!1s0x0:0xa0af309a39981950!5m1!1s2018-09-30!8m2!3d41.0774201!4d29.0135852]]> Esentepe Mah, Büyükdere Cd. No:177-183 <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Wyndham+Grand+Istanbul+Levent/@41.0774201,29.0135852,15z/data=!4m7!3m6!1s0x0:0xa0af309a39981950!5m1!1s2018-09-30!8m2!3d41.0774201!4d29.0135852]]> 34394 Şişli/İstanbul <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Wyndham+Grand+Istanbul+Levent/@41.0774201,29.0135852,15z/data=!4m7!3m6!1s0x0:0xa0af309a39981950!5m1!1s2018-09-30!8m2!3d41.0774201!4d29.0135852]]>
Parking Info:
- There is free valet parking at the hotel
We look forward to seeing you on Tuesday! Tasha Isenberg and the SpringOne Tour Team
